title: Top_10_animes_2023
text:
Nessa sessão apresento a raspagaem da lista dos animes mais vistos em 2023 de acordo com o site: https://pt.ign.com/anime/133585/gallery/os-10-anime-mais-vistos-em-2023-series?p=1
install.packages(“rvest”) install.packages(“httr”) install.packages(“tidyverse”) install.packages(“stringr”) library(tidyverse) library(rvest) library(httr) library(stringr)
url <- “https://pt.ign.com/anime/133585/gallery/os-10-anime-mais-vistos-em-2023-series?p=1”
headers <- c( “User-Agent” = “Chrome/58.0.3029.110” )
response <-GET(url, add_headers(headers))
html <-read_html(content(response, “text”))
html <- read_html(url)
top10animes <- html |> html_elements(“h1”) |> html_text2()
top10animes
``````````
top10animes
[1] “Os 10 anime mais vistos em 2023 [Séries]”
[2] “”
[3] “Dr. Stone: New World”
[4] “Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 2”
[5] “Vinland Saga Season 2”
[6] “Mashle”
[7] “Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead”
[8] “Heavenly Delusion”
[9] “Jigokuraku”
[10] “Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Swordsmith Village Arc” [11] “Jujutsu Kaisen 2nd Season”
[12] “Oshi no Ko”
